TopicTitle: I want to go to KerbalX but i can't!

Articles.Content: I'm trying to load KerbalX but it says: An error occurred in the application and your page could not be served. If you are the application owner, check your logs for details. You can do this from the Heroku CLI with the command. How could i fix this?

@somekspjet Is KerbalX still down for you?

It's currently working for me. It occasionally goes down (perhaps a few hours per month) at seemingly random times due to maintenance or technical problems.
I just got an application error. It's working now. Thank you!
